overview: Roof Rx Florida offers the best roof repair in the state of Florida. Why? Because we can provide residential AND commercial roof repair with fast, clean and same-day service. Roof Rx Florida uses premium roofing products, and our contractors have experience working with every major roofing system/materials. Whether you are a home or business owner, we can get your roof back in shape. Your roof protects your home from weather. Ensuring that your roofing system is not damage and working properly will prevent major repairs. Our roofing company can help you prevent a major repair or failure through system inspections and roof maintenance. If you are interested in scheduling an appointment to receive a free roofing estimate from Roof Rx Florida call us now - toll free (800) 676-8888.
